Description.Text:
Property Location
Classik Hotel is in the heart of St. Petersburg, walking distance from Bread Museum and Loft Project Etagi. This hotel is within close proximity of Arctic and Antarctic Museum and Dostoyevsky Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 74 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones with free local calls, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an indoor pool and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and supervised childcare/activities.

Dining
A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, a safe deposit box at the front desk, and an elevator (lift). A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is noon
A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Classik Hotel is in the heart of St. Petersburg, walking distance from Bread Museum and Loft Project Etagi. This hotel is within close proximity of Arctic and Antarctic Museum and Dostoyevsky Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Bread Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Loft Project Etagi - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Arctic and Antarctic Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Dostoyevsky Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Vladimirskaya Church - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Galeria - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Microminiature Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Stockmann - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Vosstaniya Square - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Cossack Cathedral of the Elevation of the Holy Cross - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Saint-Petersburg State Jazz Philharmonic Hall - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Planet Neptune - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Horrors of St. Petersburg Museum - 1 km / 0.7 mi
Nash Theater - 1 km / 0.7 mi
Beloselsky-Belozersky Palace - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The preferred airport for Classik Hotel is St. Petersburg (LED-Pulkovo) - 14.8 km / 9.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
